definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself

sentences.english: Khomeini’s regime responded with remarkable brutality, slaughtering thousands of the organization’s members.
sentences.chinese: 霍梅尼政权残忍的镇压游行，屠杀了几千名组织成员。

sentences.english: This image is stark in its brutality but was the reality of the time.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片虽然很残忍，但是当时的真实写照。

sentences.english: Othello loves his wife Desdemona, but throttles her mercilessly.
sentences.chinese: 奥塞罗爱妻子但却残忍地扼死了妻子并终于自杀。

sentences.english: Extravagance and vanity had made him coldhearted and selfish.
sentences.chinese: 放荡和虚荣使他变得残忍自私。

sentences.english: A year later, my cruel and desperate for your story.
sentences.chinese: 壹年后，我的残忍加你的绝情让故事落幕。

sentences.english: Without love a person could go hayward and also become cruel and ferocious.
sentences.chinese: 没有爱一个人会看破红尘也会变得凶狠残忍。

sentences.english: His cruelty belied his kind words.
sentences.chinese: 他的残忍表明他的好话是虚伪的。

sentences.english: The cruelest part was the killing of the dog.
sentences.chinese: 而最残忍的是杀狗的一幕。
它天性还记仇，并且残忍。

sentences.english: Her mother had said cruel, shameless things.
sentences.chinese: 她妈妈说了些残忍而无耻的话。

sentences.english: You need to be ruthless as you work on required business capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 在处理所需的业务功能时，您需要“残忍”一些。

sentences.english: As long as it stays in the realm of imagination, the crueller the better - that's healthy.
sentences.chinese: 只要是在想象之中，越残忍越好，这是健康的。

sentences.english: The cruel scene unfolded Thursday last week onthe Xiamen Baicheng city beach.
sentences.chinese: 上周四这样的残忍景象发生在厦门白城市的海滩上。

sentences.english: Hanging is an atrociously archaic way of killing a human being.
sentences.chinese: 绞刑是一种残忍的杀人方法。

sentences.english: I don't like his cruel treatment of those poor horses.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢他那么残忍的对待那些廋弱的马。

sentences.english: Growth is a cruel plunder, rob to naive, take pure.
sentences.chinese: 成长是一场残忍的掠夺，抢去天真，夺走单纯。

definition: to be devoid of all humanity/inhuman/bestial
